page.title: 13REDDISH ROLLER DISCO
page.content: At the{Roller Disco}you pay a pound to get in. if you want to get to the ring you go into a big hall down stairs. You usually stay in for one and a half hours. As you skate around there is music playing. There are always lots of people there in their{roller boots and you can hardly move. Some people get in a bad mood bacause everyone pushes and never say sorry. I really enjoy going to the{roller disco because you get out for the night instead of being bored at home. When it is over, you can bring fifty pence for a drink and a packet of crisps. Then everyone goes home.
